content: crochet hook into the same stitch again and pull yarn through the loop repeat once more there are 5 loops on the hook take the yarn to the hook and pull the yarn trough all 5 loops insert crochet hook into to the purl loop behind the bobble and pull yarn through that and the loop on the crochet hook set the st on the right needle note if you wan´t to you can make the same kind of a bobble with the needles you have in the work you just have to knit the last stitch pulled through the loop and slip the rest four sts over that st last knit one st trough the purl loop behind the bobble copyright marika vuorinen 2021 3 all content for personal use only e-mail tammirinnes@gmail com tammirinne cast on using us 4 3 5 mm needles and italian method cast on 40 sts cuff set up row k1 p1 until the end of the row round 1 join for working in the round be careful not to twist stitches *ktbl p1* until the end of the round mark the beginning of the round if you use magic-loop method set the first 19 sts on to the first needle and the rest 21 sts on to the second needle if you use dpns set the first 19 sts to the needles 1 and 2 and the last 21 sts to the needles 3 and 4 continue in *ktbl p1* pattern until the cuff measures 2 56 6 5 cm or desired length sm while working copyright marika vuorinen 2021 4 all content for personal use only e-mail tammirinnes@gmail com tammirinne hand with the first 19 sts start working row 1 from the chart pm for marking the place if needed k21 sm from now on work always from the chart with the first 19 sts if not instructed otherwise *work next row from the chart k21 sm* repeat *-* until you have worked the r 26 from the chart work row 27 from the chart with the remaining 21 sts work thumb hole as follows right thumb k1 k8 to the waste yarn slip 8 sts knitted with the waste yarn back to the left needle and knit sts again with the main yarn k12 sm left thumb k12 k8 to the waste yarn slip 8 sts knitted with the waste yarn back to the left needle and knit sts again with the main yarn k1 sm work row 28 from the chart k21 sm *work the next row from the chart k21 sm* repeat *-* until you have worked row 37 from the chart repeat row 18-37 from the chart once more and k with the last 21 sts in a round as before note when working row 27 from the chart skip the thump hole part and just knit the last 21 sts work row 38 from the chart k21
